name: Bhool ma Bhulyo
lyrics:
[C5]Bheten maile shiva ji, [E5]/[F5]/[E5]Pashupati janda
[C5]Bhanyo bhasan din aako haina, [E5]/[F5]/[E5]Ke bhayo deshma
[G]Laaj le maile maafa mange, [F]ke garna sodhen
[C5]Sodhyo malai ulle ulta, [G5]Nepali chha ki chhaina
[C5]Dulen hami deaurali, [E5]/[F5]/[E5]Sita ko paila ma
[C5]Bhete shiva ko chela haru, [E5]/[F5]/[E5]Pipal boat ke phed ma
[G]Aagi pachi kwireni, [F]Khojdai aako dharma
[C5]Lagyo hamro baba ji lai United States ma

[A5C5]Jatilta ko jeevan mero, [F5]Bhool ma bhul yo hamro maan

name: Comfortably Numb
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
[Bsus2]Hello?
[Bm]Is there anybody [A]in there?
[G]Just nod if you can [G/F#]hear me
[Em]Is there anyone at [Bm]home?

[Bsus2]Come on now
[Bm]I hear you're feeling [A]down
[G]I can ease your [G/F#]pain
[Em]And get you on your [Bm]feet again

[Bsus2]Relax
[Bm]I'll need some information [A]first
[G]Just the basic [G/F#]facts
[Em]Can you show me where it [Bm]hurts?

[Chorus]
[D]There is no [A]pain, you are [D]receding
[A]A distant ship smoke on the [G/B]horizon
[C]You are only [G]coming through in [G/B]waves
[C]Your lips move but I can't hear what you're [G]saying

[D]When I was a [A]child I had a [D]fever
[A]My hands felt just like two [G/B]balloons
[C]Now I've got that feeling once [G]again, I can't explain,
[G/B]You would not understand, this is not how I [C]am

[A]I have become [G/B]comfortably [Cadd9]numb

[Guitar Solo 1]
[D] [A] [D] [A] [C] [G] [C] [G]
[A] [G/B] [Cadd9] [G] [D] [A] [G/B] [C] [G]

[Verse 2]
[Bsus2]O.K.
[Bm]Just a little [A]pinprick
[G]There'll be no more [Em]aaaaaaa[D]h!
[A]But you may feel a little [Bm]sick

[Bsus2]Can you stand [Bm]up?
[A]I do believe it's working, [G]good
[Em]That'll keep you going through the [Bm]show
Come on, it's time to [D]go

[Chorus]
[D]There is no [A]pain, you are [D]receding
[A]A distant ship smoke on the [G/B]horizon
[C]You are only [G]coming through in [G/B]waves
[C]Your lips move but I can't hear what you're [G]saying

[D]When I was a [A]child, I caught a fleeting [D]glimpse
[A]Out of the corner of my [G/B]eye
[C]I turned to look but it was [G]gone
[G/B]I cannot put my finger on it [C]now
[G]The child is grown, the dream is [Asus4]gone

[A]And I have become [G/B]comfortably [Cadd9]numb

[Guitar Solo 2]
[Bm] [A] [G] [Em] [Bm]

name: Dum maro dum
lyrics:
[Am]Dam maru dam mit jae gum
[Dm]Bolo shubh saam hare Krishna hare ram[X2]
[Am]Dunia ne ham ko diya kya?
[G]Humne duniyase liyeya kya?
[F]Hum saabki pharawa kare kun?
[G]Saabne hamar kiya kya ha ho

[Am]In the cool of the summer night
[F]Touching you when I close my eyes
[D]It was only yesterday
[G]You were lying by my side

[Am]In the heat of the summer night
[F]Vision of yours in my sight
[D]It was only yesterday
[G]You were walking walking by my side

[Am]Lord no lord no did I miss you
[D]Charging now charging to save all world
[Am]I left loved my behind me

name: Stairway To Heaven
lyrics:
[Intro]

| [Am]   [Cmaj7/G#] | [C/G]   [D/F#] | [Fmaj7]     | [Am/B] [Am] 

[Verse]

[Fmaj7]      [Am]      [Cmaj7/G#]         [C/G]        [D/F#] 
There's a lady who's [Fmaj7]sure all that glitters is gold
[Fmaj7]                         [Am/B]  [Am] 
And she's buying a stairway to heaven
[Fmaj7]     [Am]           [Cmaj7/G#]        [C/G]            [D/F#] 
When she gets there she knows, if the stores are all closed
[Fmaj7]                           [Am/B]   [Am] 
With a word she can get what she came for
[C]  [D] [Fmaj7] [Am]          [C]        [G]          [Dsus4] [D] 
Ooh, ooh,    and she's buying a stairway to heaven

[Am]        [Cmaj7]      [D]              [Fmaj7]      [Am] 
There's a sign on the wall but she wants to be sure
[Am]          [C]              [D]             [Fmaj7] 
'Cause you know sometimes words have two meanings
[Fmaj7]  [Am]      [Cmaj7/G#]           [C/G]          [D/F#] 
In a tree by the brook, there's a songbird who sings,
[D/F#]       [C]                     [Am/B] [Am] 
Sometimes all of our thoughts are misgiven

[Am7]    [Am]   [Dsus2]   [D]              [Am7] [Am]   [Em] [D] [C]   [D] 
                 Ooh, it makes me wonder
[Am7]    [Am]   [Dsus2]   [D]              [Am7] [Am]   [Em] [D] [C]   [D] 
                 Ooh, it makes me wonder

[D]           [C]      [G/B]         [Asus2] [Am] 
There's a feeling I get when I look to the west,
[Am]       [C]       [G/B]      [Fmaj7#11] [Am] 
And my spirit is crying for leaving
[Am]     [C]     [G/B]                   [Asus2]    [Am] 
In my thoughts I have seen rings of smoke through the trees,
[Am]       [C]     [G/B]              [Fmaj7] [Am] 
And the voices of those who stand looking

[Am7]    [Am]   [Dsus2]   [D]              [Am7] [Am]   [Em] [D] [C]   [D] 
                 Ooh, it makes me wonder
[Am7]    [Am]   [Dsus2]   [D]                    [Am7] [Am]   [Em] [D] [C]   [D] 
                 Ooh, it really makes me wonder

[D]         [C]             [G/B]      [Asus2] [Am] 
And it's whispered that soon if we all call the tune
[D]         [C]         [G/B]    [Fmaj7#11] 
Then the piper will lead us to reason
[D]         [C]             [G/B]      [Asus2] [Am] 
And a new day will dawn for those who stand long
[D]         [C]         [G/B]    [Fmaj7#11] 
And the forests will echo with laughter

[C]            [G/B]            [Am]                 [Am/B] 
If there's a bustle in your hedgerow, don't be alarmed now,
[C]           [G/B]                 [Fmaj7] [Am] 
It's just a spring clean for the May Queen
[C]              [G/B]               [Am]               [Am/B] 
Yes, there are two paths you can go by, but in the long run
[C]             [G/B]               [Fmaj7]      [Am] 
There's still time to change the road you're on

[Am7]    [Am]   [Dsus2]   [D]              [Am7] [Am]   [Em] [D] [C]   [D] 
                 Ooh, it makes me wonder
[Am7]    [Am]   [Dsus2]   [D]                    [Am7] [Am]   [Em] [D] [C]   [D] 
                 Ooh, it really makes me wonder

[C]            [G/B]             [Am]                   [Am/B] 
Your head is humming and it won't go, in case you don't know,
[C]           [G/B]           [Fmaj7] [Am] 
The piper's calling you to join him
[C]          [G/B]              [Am]                   [Am/B] 
Dear lady, can you hear the wind blow, and did you know
[C]             [G/B]         [Fmaj7]      [Am] 
Your stairway lies on the whispering wind

[C]   [G]   [D]   [Dsus2]   [D]   [Dsus4]
[Dsus2]   [D]   [Dsus4]   [Dsus2]   [D]   [Dsus4] [Dsus4]  [D] [Cadd9]

[Am] [Am7] [Fmaj7]   x8

[Am] [Am7] [Fmaj7]   [Am] 

And she's buying a stairway to heaven

name: Swatantra Jeevan
lyrics:
[G]Hawa ko saath ma mero maan duli raancha
[Em]Thachha malai timro dukha
[C]Risaun bhane mero maan dukhna thalcha
[D]Hirkaun bhane ma haari jaanchu
[G]Neta bhanera timile daura surwal launchau
[Em]Ke dekhchau timro aaina ma
[C]Kaath ra dhunga le mero saar maachna sakchau
[D]Tara mardaina yo jeevan yo swatantra jeevan

SOLO: [G] [Em] [C] [D]

[G]/[Em]/[C]/[D]
Timro bata ma kehi lina mandina
Samasya chaina mero jindagi ma
Chod dinchhu timilai mero aakash ko tara
Mero maan ko maya
Timilai maile kehi bhanna sakdina
Thaha chha aafno bani behora
Yekchin ko lagi timile sochyau bhane
Dekhla mero jeevan yo swatantra jeevan
